name: Rich Editor
description: This is the interface for editing rich text, which presents the user with a WYSIWYG editing area.

properties.name: content
properties.label: Content
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the content of the rich editor.
properties.settingTooltip: Define the content of the editor.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.label: Placeholder
properties.settingTooltip: Define the placeholder of the editor.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the placeholder of the rich editor.

properties.name: toolbarPosition
properties.label: Toolbar Position
properties.settingTooltip: Select the position of the toolbar.

properties.name: fixedToolbar
properties.label: Fixed Toolbar
properties.settingTooltip: Select to pin the toolbar.

properties.name: showTooltips
properties.label: Show Tooltips
properties.settingTooltip: Select to show tooltips on the toolbar buttons.

properties.name: readOnly
properties.label: Read Only
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the editor content should be editable. If the handler returns 'true' the content will be read-only.
properties.settingTooltip: Disable the ability to edit the content.

properties.name: editorHeight
properties.label: Editor Height
properties.settingTooltip: The height of the editor.

properties.name: editorMinHeight
properties.label: Editor Min Height
properties.settingTooltip: The minimal height of the editor.

properties.name: scrollingContainer
properties.label: Scrolling Container
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine DOM Element or a CSS selector for DOM Element, indicating which container has scrollbars. Specify only when the editor is set to auto grow its height.
properties.settingTooltip: Define the container that has the scrollbars.

properties.name: borderWidth
properties.label: Border Width
properties.settingTooltip: The width of the editor border.

properties.name: borderStyle
properties.label: Border Style
properties.settingTooltip: Select the style of the editor border.

properties.name: borderColor
properties.label: Border Color
properties.settingTooltip: Set the color of the editor border.

properties.name: linkInsertButton
properties.label: Link Insert Button
properties.settingTooltip: Show the button to insert a link.

properties.name: imageInsertButton
properties.label: Image Insert Button
properties.settingTooltip: Show the button to insert an image.

properties.name: videoInsertButton
properties.label: Video Insert Button
properties.settingTooltip: Show the button to insert a video.

properties.name: fontStyleButtons
properties.label: Font Style Buttons
properties.settingTooltip: Show buttons to make text bold, italic, underlined, or crossed out.

properties.name: historyButtons
properties.label: History Buttons
properties.settingTooltip: Show undo and redo buttons.

properties.name: fontSelect
properties.label: Font Select
properties.settingTooltip: Show the select to specify the font in the editor.

properties.name: fontSizeSelect
properties.label: Font Size Select
properties.settingTooltip: Show the select to specify the font size in the editor.

properties.name: textColorPicker
properties.label: Text Color Picker
properties.settingTooltip: Show the picker to specify the text color.

properties.name: backgroundColorPicker
properties.label: Background Color Picker
properties.settingTooltip: Show the picker to specify the background color.

properties.name: alignmentButtons
properties.label: Alignment Buttons
properties.settingTooltip: Show buttons to specify the text alignment.

properties.name: listButtons
properties.label: List Buttons
properties.settingTooltip: Show buttons to create lists in the editor.

properties.name: scriptButtons
properties.label: Script Buttons
properties.settingTooltip: Show buttons to make text subscript or superscript.

properties.name: textBlockButtons
properties.label: Text Block Buttons
properties.settingTooltip: Show buttons to format text as a quote or code.

properties.name: headingButtons
properties.label: Heading Buttons
properties.settingTooltip: Show buttons to format text as section headings.

properties.name: textDirectionButton
properties.label: Text Direction Button
properties.settingTooltip: Show buttons to specify the text direction.

properties.name: clearFormattingButton
properties.label: Clear Formatting Button
properties.settingTooltip: Show the button to remove all formatting in the editor.

properties.name: defaultFontFamily
properties.label: Default Font Family
properties.settingTooltip: Select the default font family of the editor.

properties.name: defaultFontSize
properties.label: Default Font Size
properties.settingTooltip: Select the default font size of the editor.

eventHandlers.name: onFocus
eventHandlers.label: On Focus Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the editor receives the focus.

eventHandlers.name: onBlur
eventHandlers.label: On Blur Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the editor loses the focus.

eventHandlers.name: onTextChange
eventHandlers.label: On Text Change Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user changes the contents of the editor.
